alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 3:47PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of south central Monterey County through 415 PM PDT... At 346 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail offshore of Gorda, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible.Lightning will be possible with this shower. Locations impacted include... Gorda. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 8 and 9, and between Mile Markers 12 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
